@graph.description:
## Overview

This artifact reproduces experiments on shortcut learning in text classification using our own implementation.

**Includes:**
- **Code:** Our reproduced code for training and evaluating models on text classification datasets.
- **Statistical Data:** Original statistical data from the paper authors, used for validation and comparison.
- **Original Paper:** [Shortcut Learning in Text Classification, Findings of EMNLP 2024](https://aclanthology.org/2024.findings-emnlp.146.pdf)

## Reproduction Goal

Validate key claims from the original paper by reproducing experiments with our own code and using the original authors’ statistical data for reference.

## Key Findings (From my experiments) 

- **Test Accuracy:** 0.6446, **Test Macro F1:** 0.6386
- **Anti-Test Accuracy:** 0.395, **Anti-Test Macro F1:** 0.3577
- **Original Test Accuracy:** 0.5758, **Original Test Macro F1:** 0.5695

Our results confirm the patterns of shortcut learning reported in the original paper.

## Environment and Modifications

- Python 3.11+, PyTorch, NumPy, HuggingFace Transformers
- Minor adaptations to improve reproducibility (e.g., offline W&B logging)
@graph.name: Shortcut Learning in Text Classification
